about_the_game:
Welcome to the Arena!
A fast paced 2D top-down arena shooter, choose your weapon from a selection of 6 each unique weapons and battle out with up to 6 players in diverse maps to choose from, in a game that is all about your skills. Compete against each other for leaderboard domination, and see who comes out to the top.


  • Intense & fast-paced multiplayer action:
    All players move fast, choose the right weapon against your enemy.

  • Have we warned you that this game is hard?
    6 Deadly weapons to choose from:



  • Matches of up to 6 players for a chaotic and unpredictable gameplay:
    {Screenshot of players with different cosmetics}
  • Leaderboards for competitive play
  • Easy to pick on but hard to master:
    We warn you, this game may look cute, but good luck surviving in the arena!
    Master the weapons to win.
  • Cosmetics:
    Yeah!, ShootEm has variety of Heroes, hats and pets to choose from!


Gather your friends and compete to see who will become the top player in SHOOTEM battle arena!

* ShootEm made primarily for friends group to play but can be playable solo in public matches.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or greater
  • Processor: Intel core i3 or equivalent AMD
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD 630 graphics or equivalent AMD
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • VR Support: N\A
  • Additional Notes: System requirements are equivalent to all other platforms

short_description: Welcome to the arena! a fast-paced 2D top-down shooter allows up to 6 players to battle across diverse maps and unique heroes, each equipped with deadly weapons. Are you up for the challenge to rise to the top and become the ultimate hero?
